entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
